fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

{{ requester }} is requesting to join the project {{ project }}.

Please visit the VPAC Account Management tool at {{ site }} for more information and to accept or decline this request.


Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: Project join request
fields.name: account_request
fields.description: Sends an email to project leader asking to approve person

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

{{ requester }} has requested to create a new project "{{ project.name }}" with project ID {{ project.pid }}.

Please visit the VPAC Account Management tool at {{ site }} for more information and to accept or decline this request. 


Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC new project request
fields.name: project_request
fields.description: Sends an email to the projects institutes delegate for approval

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

Your request to create the new project "{{ project }}"  approved and you can now start using your VPAC computer account.
You can now also log into the VPAC account management tool to see the status of your account by going to {{ site }}


Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC Project has been approved
fields.name: project_approved
fields.description: Sends an email if project has been approved

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }}

Your request to create the project "{{ project }}" has been declined by your institutes delegate.


Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC Project has been rejected
fields.name: project_rejected
fields.description: Sends email if project has been rejected

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

Your VPAC computer account has been approved and you are now a member of the project "{{ project }}".

You can now log into the VPAC account management tool to see the status of your account by going to https://www.vpac.org/accounts/profile/.

For your records, your username is {{ receiver.username }}.


Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC Account approval
fields.name: account_approved
fields.description: Sends an email informing person account is ready

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }}

Your request to join the project "{{ project }}" has been declined. This may have been by either the leader of the project, {{ project.leader }}, or by the VPAC administrative team.

Please contact the VPAC administrative team at accounts@vpac.org

Thanks,

VPAC Accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC Account rejected
fields.name: account_rejected
fields.description: Sends an email informing person account has been rejected

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver.first_name }},

Your request to join project "{{ project.name }}" with project ID {{ project.pid }} has been approved. You may view the project details and your VPAC profile at {{ site }}

Please NOTE that your default project has not changed. If you would like to change it please go to the link mentioned above.


Thanks,

VPAC accounts team
fields.subject: VPAC project request approval
fields.name: project_joined_approved
fields.description: Sent when request to join a project approved

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

You have been removed from the project {{ project.name }}.
fields.subject: VPAC Project
fields.name: removed_from_project
fields.description: Sent when a user is removed from a project

fields.body:
Hello {{ receiver }},

This is in reference to your VPAC project:

-------------------------------------------------------------
  {{ project }}.
-------------------------------------------------------------

VPAC has tried to contact the project member {{ person }}
but we have found that their email address no longer works.

The address we tried was <{{person.email}}>.

Please could you contact the VPAC help desk by replying to
this email to confirm their status in your project and passing
on any new contact details that you may have for them ?

Also, if they are no longer in the project can you please tell us
whether you wish to sort through their data or can it be
disposed of ?

Thank you!

The VPAC help desk.
-- 
 The Victorian Partnership for Advanced Computing
 P.O. Box 201, Carlton South, VIC 3053, Australia
VPAC is a not-for-profit Registered Research Agency
fields.subject: A member of your VPAC project "{{ project.pid }}" has an invalid email address
fields.name: bounced_email
fields.description: Sends an email to project leader informing him person has invalid email

fields.subject: VPAC Project {{ project.pid }}
fields.name: leader_quarter_summary
